column1: Do you have a persistent cough that doesn't go away?
column2: Are you coughing up blood or rust-colored sputum?
column3: Do you experience hoarseness or wheezing?
column4: Do you have chest pain that worsens with deep breaths?
column5: Have you experienced significant weight loss or fatigue recently?
column6: Do you currently smoke or have a history of smoking?
column7: Are you frequently exposed to secondhand smoke, asbestos, or radon?
column8: Do you have a family history of lung cancer?
column9: Have you been exposed to occupational hazards (e.g. mining, construction)?
column10: Have you previously had radiation therapy to the chest?
column11: Do you have any chronic lung diseases (e.g. COPD, TB scars)?
column13: Are you above 45 years of age?

column2: Are you above 45 years of age?
